DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare human insulin inhalation powder plus oral anti-hyperglycemic medication inject insulin ( neutral protamine hegedom insulin ) plus oral anti-hyperglycemic medication lower blood sugar level .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: 1 . Type 2 diabetes mellitus least 6 month 2 . One oral antihyperglycemic medication least 12 week 3 . HbA1c equal great 7.0 % , equal less 10.5 % 4 . Nonsmokers , smoke least 6 month agree smoke ( cigar , cigarette , pipe ) use smokeless tobacco duration study 5 . Satisfactory lung function result meet requirement study 1 . Previously receive form inhale insulin 2 . Have current diagnosis past history asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease clinically relevant lung disease 3 . History presence liver disease 4 . History presence kidney disease
